title: Wupatki National Monument: Virtual Tour
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Virtual Tour               Virtual Tour         Wupatki Pueblo at sunrise NPS Photo  Wupatki Pueblo Tour   Enjoy a unique inside look at Wupatki Pueblo. This virtual tour takes you through a series of four rooms that are not open to the public. The video was shot during an archaeological project to repair the drainage system in the pueblo.  Â      Wupatki Visitor Center entrance Wupatki Visitor Center entrance  Visitor Center and Museum  Take a tour of the Wupatki Visitor Center, and examine our digital museum collections at the American Southwest Virtual Museum.
